We have already detailed the launch deals on the TechWoven and, extremely divisive, Apple Clear MagSafe cases for the new iPhone 17 Pro and 17 Pro Max. Those offers are still live and are also sitting alongside the new lineup of minimalist Apple iPhone 17 Pro/Max Silicone Cases with MagSafe. There’s certainly more affordable silicone models out there, a lot more affordable, but I still know folks who swear by their Apple Silicone every year and all the new colors are now seeing price drops.

items.title: Neon, the No. 2 social app on the Apple App Store, pays users to record their phone calls and sells data to AI firms
items.summary: A new call recording app is gaining traction for offering to pay users for voice data from calls, which is sold to AI companies.

items.title: Canadian PE firm Novacap agrees to acquire Integral Ad Science, which provides digital ad measurement and verification, in a deal valuing IAS at about $1.9B (Ryan Gould/Bloomberg)
items.summary:
Ryan Gould / Bloomberg:
Canadian PE firm Novacap agrees to acquire Integral Ad Science, which provides digital ad measurement and verification, in a deal valuing IAS at about $1.9B  —  Novacap has agreed to acquire Integral Ad Science Holding Corp. in a deal that values the advertising analytics company at about $1.9 billion.

items.title: Zoox asks federal regulators for exemption to launch a commercial robotaxi service
items.summary: The exemption would allow the Amazon-owned autonomous vehicle company to commercially deploy its custom-built robotaxis, which lack traditional controls like pedals and a steering wheel.

items.title: Trump administration wants 10% stake in American lithium miner that sells to GM
items.summary: Lithium Americas asked for a small change to the loan repayment period, which spurred the latest Trump administration request for equity.

items.title: YouTube now lets you hide recommendation pop-ups at the end of videos
items.summary: The decision to let users hide end screens is a welcome addition to the platform, especially since they can end up covering the last bit of a video and make it hard to see what's happening in some cases.

items.title: Early Prime Big Deal Days knocks a giant 50% off the 2025 model Blink smart doorbell from just $30
items.summary:
The official early Prime Big Deal Days are kicking off today at Amazon – we already featured the new all-time low on the latest Ring Battery Doorbell Pro at $100 off – and now we are tracking a deep 50% price drop on Amazon’s 2025 model Blink Video Doorbell. You will find a giant selection of smart home security bundles and Blink cam deals now live as part of the sale right here and some additional details waiting down below on the 2025 model front door solution.

items.title: Scoop up an extra pair of Anker dual-port wall chargers with 2 included USB-C cables at $12 ($6 each)
items.summary:
2-pack of Anker 20W dual-port wall chargers and USB-C cables

Buy for $12 (Reg. $19)

What we love

If you’re looking for ultra-affordable wall chargers, it doesn’t get much more inexpensive than under $6.50 a pop, and these two comes with a pair of USB-C cables too. they aren’t the most powerful, but they do include USB-C and USB-A ports and makes for a great set of spares around the hours or in your EDC.

items.summary:
The Pokémon Company has announced that Pokémon TCG: Mega Evolution, the first expansion in the brand-new Mega Evolution Series, will launch on September 26, 2025. This is the most excited I have been about a new Pokémon set since the 151 set! Ahead of release, I got my hands on several of the upcoming products, and here’s a breakdown of what’s inside each one and why fans should be excited.

items.title: Land a 2-pack of iPhone Air or iPhone 17/Pro screen and lens protectors from just $4.50 today ($2 each)
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find amFilm’s official storefront offering a 2-pack of its iPhone 17/Air screen and camera lens protector combo for $4.49 Prime shipped. Don’t forget to enter promo code EUZWG92J during checkout to see the discounted price. Also, folks without a Prime membership can dodge the shipping fee by checking out with items worth over $35 in the cart. This combo is, in fact, available for all the latest iPhone – iPhone Air, iPhone 17, 17 Pro, and 17 Pro Max – so you’re covered regardless of the one you’ve picked up. The promo code works across the board, saving you a solid 62% as this 2-pack is regularly priced at $12 a set. Head below for more details.

items.title: How to build a GTM strategy that actually drives results at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
items.summary: At TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, GTM pros Max Altschuler, Alison Wagonfeld, and Marc Manara take the Builders Stage to show founders how to build a go-to-market engine that doesn’t just support the product, but also scales with it.

items.title: Coding made easy with lifetime access to Microsoft Visual Studio Professional at $56 (Reg. up to $1,999)
items.summary:
Trying to make the next big app? Don’t miss lifetime access to Microsoft Visual Studio Professional 2022 for just $55.97 (Reg. $1,999.00). There’s something romantic about coding. Romantic may not be the word most people associate with those of us that spend hours in front of our computers, coding, but there’s something optimistic about creating worlds from nothing just because you dreamed it up. And the better you are at coding, the easier it is to create those worlds. Whether you’re a hobbyist or a professional coder, you can take your skills to the next level with this premium coding bundle — and it’s currently 97% off.

more…

items.title: ROVE’s R3 3-channel dash cam covers front, rear, and cabin views at a $180 low (Reg. $260+), more models from $87
items.summary:
Coming to us through its official Amazon storefront, ROVE is offering its R3 3-Channel Dash Cam for $179.99 shipped. While it carries a $400 MSRP elsewhere, it’s been spending the year sitting at a full rate of $260 without discounts. We’ve regularly seen it dropping down to this rate over 2025, mostly in the form of short-term Lightning deals, with some longer-lasting savings periods, like we’re seeing today. This is a 31% markdown off the going rate, cutting $80 from the tag for the best price we have tracked. Head below for more on this system and the others currently benefiting from discounts.

more…

items.title: Tested: If you’re looking for a proper artisan leather iPhone Air case, check this one out [Deal]
items.summary:
Burton Goods and its beautiful handmade leather cases are back for iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max, but today we are taking a closer hands-on look at its brand new iPhone Air case – the Heritage Leather. If you like leather goods, real proper artisanship, and a case the ages beautifully, Burton Goods should be on your radar – but can it keep up with Apple’s awe dropping new ultra-thin iPhone?

items.title: This 100W UGREEN retractable USB-C charger saves you the hassle of carrying a cable down at $45 today
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find UGREEN’s official storefront offering its Nexode 100W GaN charger with a built-in USB-C cable for $44.98 shipped. This particular unit debuted as part of the brand’s Nexode retractable series earlier this year in June carrying a $60 price tag. Today’s deal delivers a 25% markdown to land it $15 below its usual going rate. It’s now matching the lowest price we first tracked for it last month, letting you have another chance at its lowest price if you missed out on the previous offer. The 45W version of this charger is also on sale for $25.49 shipped right now, so consider that if you don’t necessarily need a beefy 100W model. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Save up to 27% on Govee’s holiday display-ready Curtain Lights from $110 + first deal on new Pro model
items.summary:
Govee is offering the first savings on its new Curtain Lights Pro at $179.99 shipped, beating out the first savings we’re seeing at Amazon by $10, though Amazon is offering bigger discounts on the previous-generation models, which start from $109.99 shipped. The newer generation model will fetch $200 at full price once the savings close out, with this being the very first chance to cut a little off the tag – just in time for folks shopping for new additions to their Halloween displays. Head below for more on this model and the previous-generation models that are also seeing discounts.

items.title: Spigen MagSafe EDC pouch meets mini iPhone 17 backpack now down at $38
items.summary:
Spigen Mini MagSafe EDC Case/iPhone backpack

Buy for $39 (Orig. up to $50)

What we love

Spigen’s mini EDC carrier also doubles as tiny magnetic iPhone 17 backpack of sorts, and obviously works with older model phones as well. It is an interesting and quite unique accessory – not only does it feature onboard MagSafe, but it also has a hand grip and carabiner clip that delivers quite a versatile mini carrier that can come in handy in a number of different situations.

items.title: Anker’s SOLIX C1000X black power station with a book-sized 100W solar panel back at its $649 low (Reg. $899, Today only)
items.summary:
As part of its Deals of the Day, Best Buy is offering the Anker SOLIX C1000X Portable Power Station with 100W “book-sized” solar panel at $649 shipped, which differs in its black colorway from the usual grey model featured at Amazon and the brand’s direct website. While picking up the standard station with a 100W panel would normally cost you up to $1,328, this colorway with the “book-sized” panel has only been seen once before in these one-day-only sales, having fallen to this same rate for the first time in late August, which remains the lowest we have tracked. For the rest of the day only, you can take advantage of the 28% markdown for $250 in savings. You could also go bigger with the solar capabilities with this bundle of the C1000 and a 200W solar panel down at $699.99 shipped right now, which has a total $799 value that you’re getting for just $51 more.

items.title: Save $1,506 today on Lenovo’s fully-loaded RTX 5090 Legion Pro 7i OLED gaming laptop with 64GB RAM/2TB SSD
items.summary:
As part of its Fall Tech Fest sale, Lenovo is offering its Legion Pro 7i 16-inch OLED gaming laptop for $3,049 shipped. Don’t forget to enter promo codes WEEKENDPOWERUP and BUYMORELENOVO to see the discounted price during checkout. We saw the RTX 5070 Ti variant of this notebook see a huge $650 discount last week, but Lenovo is cutting even deeper on its top-tier Legion Pro 7i configuration this time. For comparison, B&H is listing the same model at $3,399 with a relatively lighter discount, while Best Buy has a similar build with 32GB of RAM (instead of 64GB) priced at $3,330. That makes today’s deal one of the strongest values around for Lenovo’s flagship gaming notebook and the lowest we can find. Head below for more details.
